Uses of Package
fr.sii.ogham.core.exception.retry

  • Packages that use fr.sii.ogham.core.exception.retry 
    Package Description
    fr.sii.ogham.core.exception.retry  
    fr.sii.ogham.core.retry  
  • Classes in fr.sii.ogham.core.exception.retry used by fr.sii.ogham.core.exception.retry 
    Class and Description
    RetryException
    Retry strategies may fail for many possible reasons: The action to retry has failed too many times ( MaximumAttemptsReachedException) The action to retry has failed with an error that should not be ignored so the action should not be retried anymore The retry strategy itself has failed The thread has been interrupted ... This is the general exception thrown by RetryExecutors and it has subclasses to indicate the detailed reason.
    RetryExecutionFailureException
    General exception that indicates that the action to retry has failed.
  • Classes in fr.sii.ogham.core.exception.retry used by fr.sii.ogham.core.retry 
    Class and Description
    RetryException
    Retry strategies may fail for many possible reasons: The action to retry has failed too many times ( MaximumAttemptsReachedException) The action to retry has failed with an error that should not be ignored so the action should not be retried anymore The retry strategy itself has failed The thread has been interrupted ... This is the general exception thrown by RetryExecutors and it has subclasses to indicate the detailed reason.
